name: alrimdd
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syld(w0, w1, wal(s0, w2), wal(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), wal(s0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w1))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

comment: Deduction form of Theorem 19.21 of [Margaris] p. 90, see ~ 19.21 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.)
